DOC.brief_summary: This study long-term follow-up patient complete least two year follow-up treatment Tositumomab and/or Iodine I 131 Tositumomab ( BEXXAR ) Study RIT-I-000 , RIT-II-001 , RIT-II-002 , RIT-II-004 CP-97-012 . Patients remain response previous treatment BEXXAR , additionally follow radiographically response progression .
DOC.brief_title: Patients With Low-Grade Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma Previously Treated With Tositumomab and/or Iodine I 131 Tositumomab
DOC.criteria: Patients must enrol one follow Corixa sponsor clinical trial : RITI000 , RITII001 , RITII002 , RIT II004 CP97012 > 2 year post Tositumomab and/or Iodine I 131 Tositumomab administration . Patients must give write informed consent sign IRB/ethics committee approve consent form prior entry followup study . Inability meet reference inclusion criterion .
